SEARCH
Package com.microdiab.mpatient.service

Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
com.microdiab.mpatient.service.PatientService
@Service public class PatientService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing Patient entities. This service provides operations to create and update patients while ensuring business rules such as duplicate prevention and existence verification.
See Also:

  • PatientDuplicateException
  • PatientNotFoundException

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientService

      public PatientService()
      Default constructor for PatientService. This constructor is used by Spring to instantiate the service as a singleton bean. All dependencies are injected automatically.

  • Method Details

    • savePatient

      public Patient savePatient(Patient patient)
      Saves a new patient in the database. Before saving, this method checks whether a patient already exists with the same last name, first name, date of birth, and gender. If such a patient is found, a PatientDuplicateException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient entity to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved Patient instance
      Throws:
      PatientDuplicateException - if a patient with identical identifying information already exists

    • updatePatient

      public Patient updatePatient(Long id, Patient updatePatient)
      Updates an existing patient. The method first verifies that the patient with the given identifier exists. If the patient cannot be found, a PatientNotFoundException is thrown. Otherwise, all modifiable fields are updated from the provided patient object.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the patient to update
      updatePatient - the patient object containing updated information
      Returns:
      the updated and persisted Patient instance
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient exists with the specified id
